backend/main.mo: Motoko canister exposing getConfig that returns brand info, hero text, and a predefined category list.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and components in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via root div and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that fetches storefront config and renders header, hero, categories, and other homepage sections with fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/CategoryShowcase: Renders category cards with icons, gradients, and a brand story section using backend-provided categories.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedCollecti: Displays three featured collection cards with icons, gradients, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with brand info, quick links using smooth scroll navigation, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays a hero section with brand logo, headline, description, and call‑to‑action buttons.
frontend/src/components/NewsletterCTA.ts: Renders a newsletter signup card with email input, submit handling, and promotional text.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHeader: Implements a responsive storefront header with navigation, search/account/cart buttons, and a mobile menu.
Shows a grid of trust badges highlighting security, shipping, returns, and support benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and login/logout logic with persistent identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches storefront configuration from the backend using the initialized actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, fonts, and Tailwind CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state, including storefront goals, architectural notes, and a list of implemented features with their versions. Contains no code, only metadata for planning and tracking progress.
